project_Overview.project_Purpose: To allow users to create projects, add tasks with deadlines, and invite team members to collaborate on task completion.
project_Overview.product_Scope: The application will enable users to create and manage projects. Within each project, users can add tasks, specifying deadlines for each task. The system will also allow users to invite other team members to collaborate on specific projects and tasks.

functional_Requirements.title: Create Project
functional_Requirements.description: Allow users to create a new project with a name and optional description.
acceptance_criteria: User can navigate to the project creation page/form.
User provides a project name.
User can optionally provide a project description.
System saves the new project associated with the logged-in user.
The newly created project appears in the user's project list.

functional_Requirements.title: Add Task to Project
functional_Requirements.description: Allow users to add a task to an existing project, specifying a task name, description, and deadline.
acceptance_criteria: User can select a project from their project list.
User can access a 'add task' function (e.g., button, form).
User enters a task name.
User enters a task description.
User specifies a task deadline.
System saves the new task associated with the selected project.
The newly created task appears in the project's task list.

functional_Requirements.title: Invite Team Members
functional_Requirements.description: Allow users to invite other registered users to collaborate on a project.
acceptance_criteria: User can select a project from their project list.
User can access a function to invite team members.
User can input the email or username of the team member they want to invite.
System sends an invitation to the specified user.
Invited user receives a notification about the invitation.
User can accept or decline the invitation.
Upon acceptance, the invited user is added as a collaborator to the project.

functional_Requirements.title: User Registration
functional_Requirements.description: Allow users to register a new account.
acceptance_criteria: User can access the registration page.
User provides necessary details like username/email and password.
The system validates input fields.
The system creates a new user account.

functional_Requirements.title: User Login
functional_Requirements.description: Allow registered users to login to their account.
acceptance_criteria: User can access the login page.
User provides login credentials.
The system authenticates user credentials.
The system allows the user to access their projects.

non_Functional_Requirements.description: The system should provide reasonable response times for common operations.
acceptance_criteria: Project creation should complete within 2 seconds.
Task creation should complete within 1 second.
User login should complete within 1 second.

non_Functional_Requirements.description: Implement basic security measures to protect user data and prevent unauthorized access.
acceptance_criteria: User passwords should be securely hashed.
Sensitive data should be transmitted over HTTPS.

non_Functional_Requirements.description: The user interface should be intuitive and easy to use.
acceptance_criteria: Navigation should be clear and consistent.
Input fields should be clearly labeled.
Error messages should be informative.

user_Interfaces: The main interface will be a dashboard showing the user's projects. Each project will display its name and a list of associated tasks. Each task item should show its name, description and deadline. There will be a 'Create Project' button and an 'Add Task' button within each project view. The invitation process will involve a user input field (email/username) to search and add team members to the project.
The login and registration pages should have a form with username/email and password fields, along with submit buttons.
hardware_Interfaces: No specific hardware requirements, assuming standard computer/mobile device hardware.
software_Interfaces: Requires a modern web browser on the client side.
communication_Interfaces: HTTPS for secure communication between client browser and web server via a RESTful API.

assumptions_Made: Defaulted to Python/FastAPI backend, HTML/CSS/JS frontend, and SQLite database as no specific technologies were requested by the user.
Assuming standard security practices like password hashing are required.

metadata.original_description: Create a task management app where users can create projects, add tasks with deadlines, and invite team members to collaborate
